body:
We are trying to install Openfoam on Intel X86-64 platform using GCC v10.2.0.
The installation "completes" succeessfully but many of the expected binaries (simpleFoam, pimpleFoam) do not seem to be actually built in /bin or /platforms/../bin 
After removing the "-silent" flag in the package.py, rerunning the command, and searching the build log: pimpleFoam does not appear in the log at all, it appears to fail before getting to the solver source files. Please see logs attached below.

--> one error does exist in the log though:
```
/mnt/central/spack/var/spack/stage/root/spack-stage-openfoam-2006_201012-ew2n27aeolegl2sqcitowa3axfzsfg73/spack-src/wmake/scripts/wrap-lemon: line 280: 87818 Aborted                 (c\
ore dumped) "$lemon" "$skel" "$@" $parserFlags "$tmpFile"
Retaining intermediate: /mnt/central/spack/var/spack/stage/root/spack-stage-openfoam-2006_201012-ew2n27aeolegl2sqcitowa3axfzsfg73/spack-src/build/linux64GccDPInt32-spack/src/OpenFOAM/e\
xpressions/fields/fieldExprLemonParser.lyy
make: *** [/mnt/central/spack/var/spack/stage/root/spack-stage-openfoam-2006_201012-ew2n27aeolegl2sqcitowa3axfzsfg73/spack-src/wmake/rules/General/transform:35: /mnt/central/spack/var/\
spack/stage/root/spack-stage-openfoam-2006_201012-ew2n27aeolegl2sqcitowa3axfzsfg73/spack-src/build/linux64GccDPInt32-spack/src/OpenFOAM/expressions/fields/fieldExprLemonParser.o] Error\
 134
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
Generating manpages from OpenFOAM applications
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install openfoam@2006_201012 ^adios2@2.4.0 
```
(adios2@2.4.0 is chosen due to open bug  #19088)
### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-5-3069631f37
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-cascadelake

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5601726/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5601727/spack-build-out.txt)

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->
@olesenm @samouyal 
### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: Openfoam silently failing to build binaries
